dcterms:creator: M. Rikters
R. Ri
T. Li
T. Nakazawa
dcterms:description: The Business Scene Dialogue corpus (BSD) is a document-level parallel corpus consisting of various business scene dialogues, each annotated with scene tags and speaker information, originally written in English or Japanese by bilingual scenario writers.
dcterms:title: Business Scene Dialogue corpus (BSD)

dcterms:creator: M. Rikters
R. Ri
T. Li
T. Nakazawa
dcterms:description: The AMI Meeting Parallel Corpus (AMI) is a document-level parallel corpus derived from 100 hours of meeting recordings in English, translated into Japanese, containing shorter utterances and various dialogue phenomena.
dcterms:title: AMI Meeting Parallel Corpus (AMI)
